reviews.review: CGI jokes and that's about it
Love it. Awesome balance of a huge cast and amazing story along with the villain Thanos!
#Avengers with the Best of 'Em All #IronMan #TonyStark What More Needs To Be Said.. The Dopest Fliest MF'r there is & The Rest of Marvel Avengers. Infinity War.
Like to see this soon enough

What a movie experience this was. What a film this is!! The Russo Brothers had delivered once again... The cast is best than ever prior to this, especially Josh Brolin as Thanos, this man brings his A game in this film and his performance is easily the best by a mile. People are going to complain that this isn't a Avenegrs movie its a Thanos movie, and I agree because it set out to be that he is the main Character, but I don't have any problems with that, and besides the Avengers are split up into 2 groups, space and earth which brings the storytelling to another level as its shows the effects of the Avengers not being together to stop the incoming threat of one Thanos. Thor has the best story arc in this film as he is suffering from the (SPOILER) death of Loki at the beginning and the fact that he is out for revenge so he needs a "Thanos killing" weapon..... Stormbreaker. Plus his entrance into Wakanda... is a YES moment, will also gives you chills. The banter between Tony and Dr. Strange is great to see throughout the film. And it ends on the greatest Cliffhanger in film history since Empire Strikes Back........ this had everything, action, humour, suspense, and ending on a chilling note....
Far far better movie than endgame. This movie created the most stunning visuals and a much enjoyable plot

Okay, I wanted to like this. But it felt like one long fight scene from the moment it started, and then when it finished... well, it didn't really finish.
Complete waste of my time.  The one MCU movie I never, ever, want to see again.
This was the most stunning movie experience I ever had. No movie ever Left me so speechless. A perfect film in so many ways.

This film masterfully combines mutiple storylines with a wide array of  MCU heroes; never letting one particularly character stand out over the others and yet still manages to keep it's central focus around it's main character: Thanos. It's focus on the villain which has been long built up brings a breath of freshness to the MCU.
this movie is amazing,a ll i have to say
